alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 3:11PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Salt Lake...eastern Davis and southwestern Morgan Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 311 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Salt Lake City International Airport, or near Salt Lake City, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Layton, Bountiful, Farmington, Kaysville, North Salt Lake, Centerville, Woods Cross, West Bountiful, Salt Lake City International Airport, Magna, Fruit Heights and Antelope Island State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 308 and 331. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 105 and 119. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
